final_answer.precision_note: All given amounts and volume are 3 s.f.; Kc is reported to 3 s.f.

method: Start with Kc = [NO2]^2/[N2O4]. Replace concentrations with moles over volume: [NO2] = n(NO2)/V and [N2O4] = n(N2O4)/V, where V = 2.00 dm3. Then Kc = (n(NO2)/V)^2 ÷ (n(N2O4)/V) = n(NO2)^2/(n(N2O4)×V). Substitute values: Kc = (0.180^2)/(0.220 × 2.00) = 0.0324/0.440 = 0.073636… so Kc = 0.0736 (3 s.f., unitless).
checks: Kc is reported as unitless as instructed in the constants section.
